articles.title: Man who admitted hanging dog from tree indicted

articles.title: Man charged with hanging dog in Jamestown indicted
articles.description: A man charged with hanging a dog from a tree in Chautauqua County has been indicted by a grand jury. Robert Overton Jr., 48, was accused of aggravated cruelty to animals -- a felony charge. According to police and court documents, Overton hanged a family

articles.author: Kaley Lynch
articles.title: Kennedy man charged with grabbing victim by neck, throwing him into vehicle
articles.description: A Kennedy man was charged with second degree harassment and endangering the welfare of a child June 15 following a report of a domestic incident. Michael Wilcox, 46, was remanded to Chautauqua County Jail and is scheduled to appear in Town of Poland Court

articles.title: 3 People Arrested for Hover Board Theft
articles.description: Three from Erie, Pennsylvania allegedly stole more than $2,000 of Hover Boards and other merchandise from the Lakewood Walmart, according to police.

articles.title: Woman Mistaken For Deer And Shot Dead While Walking Her Dogs: Report
articles.description: A hunter fatally shot a New York woman after sundown on Wednesday after apparently mistaking her for a deer, local officials said. The hunter, identified as 34-year-old Thomas Jadlowski, was not charged in the shooting, though he violated state law by hunting…
